Articles.Content: This seems to happen to me when going to a high time warp, about 50% of the vessels. I live with it as it's barely a minor issue...aesthetics only. Anybody else have this happen?

No stock dV, no improved burn time indicator...I assume this is a 1.4.x install? Disappearing/misaligned shrouds are a common and known issue in this game version, should be fixed in later versions but not quiet sure if it actually is.
Pretty sure it is fixed now. I certainly haven't seen any such thing in 1.6.

Yep, 1.4.3. Was getting ready and gathering mods to update to 1.5...and then 1.6 came out  . SO now waiting on 1.6 mods.

Thanks guys!

On 1/26/2019 at 3:02 PM, 4x4cheesecake said:

No stock dV, no improved burn time indicator...I assume this is a 1.4.x install? Disappearing/misaligned shrouds are a common and known issue in this game version, should be fixed in later versions but not quiet sure if it actually is.

I haven't run across this in 1.5/1.6 yet. Still may be there somewhere, but certainly a lot less common. It used to happen all the time
Yeah, it used to happen a lot. Always just a visual glitch.
